languages.text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.
languages.original_text: Союзники, которых навигатор выбирает целью своих {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, получают +5 при {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверках на сопротивление{/g} эффектам {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}варпа{/g} (от демонов, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}, сил навигатора и др.) до конца боя. Эффекты от каждой примененной способности суммируются.

traits.locale_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's abilities gain +5 to all resistance checks against warp effects (caused by daemons, psychic powers, Navigator's powers, and such) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied Navigator's ability.

Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's abilities gain +5 to all resistance tests against warp effects (caused by daemons, psychic powers, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied Navigator ability.

Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.

The effect stacks with every applied ability.

traits.locale_text: Союзники, которых навигатор выбирает целью своих {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, получают +5 при проверках на сопротивление эффектам варпа (от демонов, психосил, сил навигатора и др.) до конца боя. Эффекты от каждой примененной способности суммируются.

Союзники, которых навигатор выбирает целью своих {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, получают +5 при проверках на сопротивление эффектам варпа (от демонов, психосил, сил навигатора и др.) до конца боя. Эффекты от каждой примененной способности суммируются.

languages.text: 受导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的盟友，在所有对抗{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}亚空间{/g}效果（包括恶魔、{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}、导航者能力造成的效果）的{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}中会获得+5加值，效果持续至战斗结束。不同导航者能力产生的效果可以叠加。
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.

traits.locale_text: 受导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的盟友，在所有对抗{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}亚空间{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}（包括恶魔、{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}、导航者能力造成的效果）的{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}中会获得+5加值，效果持续至战斗结束。不同导航者能力产生的效果可以叠加。

受导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的盟友，在所有对抗{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}亚空间{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}（包括恶魔、{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}、导航者能力造成的效果）的{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}中会获得+5加值，效果持续至战斗结束。不同导航者能力产生的效果可以叠加。

languages.text: Los aliados que sean seleccionados como objetivos de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del Navegante ganan un +5 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} que realicen contra efectos de la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}disformidad{/g} (causados por daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}, poderes de Navegante, etc.) hasta el final del combate. El efecto se acumula con cada capacidad que se aplique.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.

traits.locale_text: Los aliados que sean seleccionados como objetivos de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del Navegante ganan un +5 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} que realicen contra {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}disformidad{/g} (causados por daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}, poderes de Navegante, etc.) hasta el final del combate. El efecto se acumula con cada capacidad que se aplique.

languages.text: Verbündete, die von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Warp{/g}-Effekte (durch Dämonen, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g}, Navigatorenkräfte, etc.). Der Effekt wird mit jeder weiteren Fähigkeit gestapelt.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.

traits.locale_text: Verbündete, die von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen Warp-Effekte (verursacht unter anderem durch Dämonen, psionische Kräfte, Navigatorkräfte). Der Effekt wird bei jeder angewendeten Navigatorfähigkeit aufaddiert.

Verbündete, die von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Warp{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekte{/g} (durch Dämonen, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g}, Navigatorenkräfte, etc.). Der Effekt wird mit jeder weiteren Fähigkeit gestapelt.

languages.text: Les alliés ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du navigateur bénéficient de +5 pour tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} aux effets du {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Warp{/g} (provoqués par les démons, les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, les pouvoirs du navigateur, etc.) jusqu'à la fin du combat. L'effet est cumulable avec chaque capacité appliquée.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.

traits.locale_text: Les alliés ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du navigateur bénéficient de +5 pour tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} aux {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Warp{/g} (provoqués par les démons, les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, les pouvoirs du navigateur, etc.) jusqu'à la fin du combat. L'effet est cumulable avec chaque capacité appliquée.

languages.text: 航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットになった味方は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}歪み{/g}効果（ディーモン、{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}、航宙士の力によって発生するもの）に対するすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に+5のボーナスを得る。この効果はアビリティが付与されるたびにスタックする。
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットになった味方は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}歪み{/g}効果（ディーモン、{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}、航宙士の力によって発生するもの）に対するすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に+5のボーナスを得る。この効果はアビリティが付与されるたびにスタックする。

航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットになった味方は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ワープ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}（ディーモン、{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}、航宙士の力によって発生するもの）に対するすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に+5のボーナスを得る。この効果はアビリティが付与されるたびに累積する。

languages.text: Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerine{/g} hedef olan dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}öteboyut{/g} etkilerine (iblislerin, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinin{/g}, Rotacı güçlerinin, vs. sebep olduğu) karşı girdikleri tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerine{/g} +5 kazanırlar. Etki, uygulanan her kabiliyetle beraber üst üste birikir.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied ability.
